alert.note: Alert for Bertie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 8:32PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bertie County through 915 PM EDT... At 831 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lewiston Woodville, or 10 miles south of Rich Square, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aulander, Lewiston Woodville, Powellsville, Roxobel, Kelford, Connaritsa and Burden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
